parameters.description: the id's of actions
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: The ID of the step to retrieve. If not provided, all steps for the pipeline will be returned.
parameters.name: step_id

parameters.description: Filter actions by type. email, phone, integration etc.
parameters.name: type

schema.description: Filter actions by type. Can be one of:email, phone,integration and other
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are greater than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: due_on[gt]

schema.description: Returns actions that are due on after the provided date
schema.title: Due on after the date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are greater than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The date should be in iso8601 format.
parameters.name: due_on[gte]

schema.description: Returns actions that are greater than or equal to the provided date
schema.title: Due on greater than or equal to date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are less than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: due_on[lt]

schema.description: Returns actions that are due on before the provided date
schema.title: Due on before the date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are less than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: due_on[lte]

schema.description: Returns actions that are less than or equal to the provided date
schema.title: Due on less than or equal to date

parameters.description: Filters actions by the user's guid. Multiple user guids can be applied.
parameters.name: user_guid

schema.description: Filters actions by the user's guid
schema.title: User guid

parameters.description: retrieves the records by using person name.
parameters.name: person_id

parameters.description: The cadence id of the action
parameters.name: cadence_id

parameters.description: The ID of the multitouch group to filter by. If not specified, all actions will be returned.
parameters.name: multitouch_group_id

schema.description: Filter actions by multitouch group id
schema.title: Multitouch group id

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are greater than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: updated_at[gt]

schema.description: Returns actions that are updated after the provided date
schema.title: Updated on after the date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are greater than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: updated_at[gte]

schema.description: Returns actions that are greater than the provided date
schema.title: Updated at greater than or equal to the date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are less than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: updated_at[lt]

schema.description: Returns actions that are updated before the provided date
schema.title: Updated on before the date

parameters.description: Returns all matching records that are less than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.
parameters.name: updated_at[lte]

schema.description: Returns actions that are less than or equal to the provided date
schema.title: Updated at less than or equal to the date

parameters.description: The field to sort by. Defaults to created_at.
parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Key to sort on, must be one of: created_at, updated_at. Defaults to updated_at
schema.title: Sort by

parameters.description: The direction to sort the results in. Can be either `asc` or `desc`.
parameters.name: sort_direction

schema.description: Direction to sort in, must be one of: ASC, DESC. Defaults to DESC
schema.title: Sort direction

parameters.description: How many records to show per page in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 25
parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: How many records to show per page in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 25
schema.title: Per page

parameters.description: The current page to fetch results from. Defaults to 1.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Whether to include total_pages and total_count in the metadata. Defaults to false
parameters.name: include_paging_counts

parameters.description: Specifies whether the max limit of 10k records should be applied to pagination counts. Affects the total_count and total_pages data.
parameters.name: limit_paging_counts

Action_list.description: A list of actions to be performed on the specified resources. The following actions are supported:- `read`: Returns the details of a resource.

items.description: A dictionary containing the data to be used to create the action.

action_details.description: { type: object, properties: { action_type: { type: string, description: The type of action to perform. , enum: [ add_member, remove_member, change_role, change_manager, delete, join, leave, accept, reject, activate, deactivate, add_login, remove_login, add_email, remove_email, add_phone, remove_phone, add_address, remove_address, add_card, remove_card, add_key, remove_key, add_note, remove_note, add_custom_field, remove_custom_field, add.

_href.description: The link to the current page.
_href.title: href

id.description: The unique identifier of the action.
id.title: Id

action_details.title: Action details

cadence.description: { type: object, properties: { frequency: { type: string, description: The frequency of the cadence. , enum: [ daily, weekly, monthly ] }, day_of_week: { type: string, description: The day of the week for the cadence.

_href.description: The link to the current page.
_href.title: href

id.description: The unique identifier of the action.
id.title: Id

cadence.title: Cadence

id.title: Id

updated_at.description: The date and time the action was last updated.
updated_at.title: Updated at

_href.description: The link to the current page.
_href.title: href

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

metadata.description: A dictionary of metadata to be stored with the action.

filtering.description: A dictionary with keys as column names and values as a list of values to filter by. Example:{ 'name': ['John', 'Jane'], 'age': [20, 30]}This will return all the actions where the name is either John or Jane and the age is either 20 or 30.
filtering.title: Filtering

current_page.description: The current page number of the collection to return.
current_page.title: Current page

next_page.description: The next page of results to fetch.
next_page.title: Next page

per_page.description: The number of items to return per page.
per_page.title: Per page

prev_page.description: The previous page of results. Use this parameter to get the previous page of results.
prev_page.title: Prev page

sort_by.description: The field to sort by. Can be one of: name, created_at, updated_at.
sort_by.title: Sort by

sort_direction.description: The direction to sort the results in. Can be either `asc` for ascending or `desc` for descending.
sort_direction.title: Sort direction
